title: Windows 11 Bookmarks Folders
content: I updated to Windows 11. My bookmarks are fine EXCEPT for the ones in folders. The folders appear to be empty. Any solution? Thanks for your help.
creator: jnugent8

title: Firefox Fails to Start After the First Time
content: Firefox will start once (maybe) and then it makes no difference where I click from (tray, programs, desktop shortcut) Firefox refuses to boot up. I've tried re-installing multiple times. If I reboot, it will start. Also sometimes I will get a New tab but the page/URL never comes up. Firefox just hangs. I'm running Windows 11.
creator: r1ch715

title: Crackling sound while playing music
content:
I have recently bought the new macbook pro 16 inch with m1 pro chip. Everytime I play music using firefox, whether it is soundcloud or youtube, and, when I load multiple applications like adobe after effects, illustrator, indesign to work, there is a crackling glitch sound from my speaker. I've tested the same using different browsers but it seems like only firefox is making this issue.

My firefox is updated to the latest version. I've tried removing all the data from my macbook and reinstalled firefox but no luck. It still makes the crackling sound.

Any leads would be really appreciated.
creator: justabjith
